column4: I have installed Ubuntu 10.04 and now I wanted to install ubuntu 8.10 as dual boot.. Does it will install normally or do I have to make chages in grub??
ubuntu 8.10 will have issues with the grub version lucid has installed. You should have done it the other way around.
Does the grub problem 'll fix if I reinstall Grub from 10.04 live CD, after installing 8.10

It might actually work, but I honestly didn't try exactly what you want so I can't say for sure. As long as you don't mess with the partition table and 10.04 data you can always reinstall grub if it gets screwed up.
